name: Toh Jin Ming (Jaden)
label: Software/Hardware Developer
summary: Passionate about technology and research, with a strong desire to design products that benefit millions. A results-oriented professional with extensive experience in technologies, seeking to leverage acquired knowledge and expertise to drive innovation and impact.

work_experience.summary: Automated the fiber network provisioning system for ViewQwest's customers and clients, and led Smart Home IoT product development.
highlights: Created and maintained automated frontend and back-end API services using Python and Django, which reduced manual process and manpower by about 80%.
Tested and maintained a Smart Home IoT product developed using Z-wave, Java, MQTT, GCP, and iOS/Android Apps. This product is used by ViewQwest's customers to control their home devices.
Led a team of 3–4 developers on these projects and products.

work_experience.summary: An attachment and training program organized by WSG and RACE academy to provide training in robotics and automation. The program included three months of training and a three-month on-the-job training (OJT) attachment with a robotics or automation company.
highlights: Learned Python and C programming languages and how to use them to control hardware devices.
Acquired knowledge of 3D CAD (Computer-Aided Design) software and became a Certified SolidWorks Associate (CSWA).
Planned, developed, and designed the ROS (Robot Operating System) curriculum for RACE Academy for future trainees.
Worked on an AMR project with Changi Airport Group to develop a robot, 'Hitch Buddy', that carries full trash bins to a disposal area.

work_experience.summary: Supported the build-up, testing, deployment, and troubleshooting of Automated Guided Vehicles (AGVs) and Autonomous Mobile Robots (AMRs) for various customers.
highlights: Learned and applied ROS (Robot Operating System).
Assisted in the setup of AMR magnetic docking, charging stations, and automated sliding door opening.
Assisted in the deployment of AMR and LiDAR mapping at customer sites.
Created Python scripts to streamline the deployment and testing of AMR and AGV.

work_experience.summary: Supported the creation of prototypes for five research projects. Gained experience with hardware and software integration, and developed skills in project management and team collaboration.
highlights: Worked with hardware devices and sensors including Arduino, NodeMCU, ESP32, RaspberryPi, and IC chips such as amplifiers, ADCs, load-cells, Zigbee, and RFID.
Used software programming languages including Arduino C/C++, Python, MySQL, PHP, JavaScript, and platforms like AWS/GCP.
Self-taught and applied skills in 3D drawing, 3D printing, and PCB design and soldering.

Managed projects including a Smart Inventory Management System, a Feet and Posture Measurement device for kids, a Water Level Tracking System, an Indoor Tracking Device for the elderly, and a Weight Monitoring System for bedridden patients.

work_experience.summary: Monitored and troubleshooted hotel networks, servers, PCs, and printers.
highlights: Monitored the network for abnormal usage via the Cisco web UI.
Performed weekly physical checks of network devices and servers.
Troubleshot guest Wi-Fi networks and hotel staff PC and network/server downtime issues.

work_experience.summary: Serviced Apache AH64D Helicopters and managed SAP systems.
highlights: Serviced, marshaled, and loaded weapons on aircraft.
Logged and checked SAP data for aircraft accuracy.
Requested spare aircraft parts via the SAP system.
Participated in an overseas detachment for exercise training in Australia.

projects.title: DIY Autonomous Robot Toy Car
projects.summary: A DIY project to build an autonomous robot toy car using Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and various sensors like LiDAR, ultrasonic, motor drivers, accelerometers, and gyroscopes. The project aims to create a toy car that can navigate autonomously using sensors and ROS (Robot Operating System).
highlights: Custom motor driver with PID control for precise speed and direction.
LiDAR-based obstacle detection and avoidance using ROS.
Planned add-on features like a camera for object detection and recognition.
Planned to improve maneuverability with additional sensors like an accelerometer and gyroscope.

images.caption: Toy Car with PID Motor Driver

projects.title: Hitch Buddy
projects.summary: A RACE Academy project with Changi Airport Group to develop an autonomous mobile robot (AMR) that can assist in carrying full trash bins to a disposal area. The project involves using ROS (Robot Operating System) for navigation and control, and it aims to improve efficiency in waste management at the airport.
highlights: Configured and tested the AMR to detect QR codes on the floor for docking and picking up trash bins.
Designed a customized hatch for the AMR to carry the trash bin.
Added a camera to the AMR for precise docking with the trash bin.

images.caption: Hitch Buddy AMR and Team members

projects.title: Vesta Shield (Smart Home Security Product)
projects.summary: Centralized IoT hub using Z-Wave & Wi-Fi; integrated smart sensors, plugs, and Zigbee lighting; hosted on GCP with Android/iOS app development.
highlights: Developed a centralized IoT hub using Z-Wave and Wi-Fi protocols.
Integrated various smart sensors, plugs, camera, and Zigbee lighting for home automation and security.
Hosted the system on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for scalability and reliability.
Developed Android and iOS applications for user control and monitoring.

images.caption: Vesta Shield Smart Home Security Product

projects.title: Weight Monitoring System for Bedridden Patients
projects.summary: Designed a low-cost, continuous weight monitoring solution using load-cell sensors; data transmitted to a mobile app for real-time analysis.
highlights: Developed a low-cost weight monitoring system using load-cell sensors.
Implemented continuous weight tracking for bedridden patients.
Transmitted data to a mobile application for real-time analysis and alerts.

projects.title: Indoor Tracking Device for Elderly Homes
projects.summary: Developed a Zigbee-based indoor location tracking system for elderly residents in healthcare facilities.
highlights: Engineered a Zigbee-based indoor location tracking system.
Designed for elderly residents in healthcare facilities to ensure safety and monitoring.
Implemented a real-time tracking and alert system for caregivers.

projects.title: Water Level Tracking System
projects.summary: Built an RFID-based water level monitoring system with a real-time web-based UI for data visualization.
highlights: Developed a water level tracking system using RFID technology.
Implemented real-time monitoring with a web-based user interface for data visualization.
Enabled alerts for low or high water levels to ensure timely action.

projects.title: Feet & Posture Measurement Device
projects.summary: Created a device to measure weight distribution and posture; integrated with a server/VM for analysis and historical tracking.
highlights: Designed a device to measure weight distribution and posture.
Integrated with a server/VM for data analysis and historical tracking.
Provided insights into posture correction and foot health.

images.caption: Web UI for Feet Measurement Device

projects.title: Smart Inventory Management System
projects.summary: Engineered a load-cell-based pick-to-light inventory tracking system with automated restocking alerts via API integration.
highlights: Developed a smart inventory management system using load-cell sensors.
Implemented pick-to-light technology for efficient inventory tracking.
Automated restocking alerts via API integration to streamline operations.

honors: Top in GCE 'N' Technical level Exam
Top in GCE 'N' Technical Basic Chinese
Top in GCE 'N' Technical Computer Application

course_certification.title: ROS for Beginners II: Localization, Navigation and SLAM

skills.name: Hardware Design, PCB Design, 3D CAD and 3D Printing
Proficiency in Time Management, Teamwork, and Communication

interests.name: Badminton
interests.summary: The only sport I play and enjoy.

interests.name: Walking
interests.summary: Walking is a great way to relax and clear my mind. I enjoy long walks in the park or around my neighborhood.

images.caption: Me walking in lower seletar reservoir

interests.name: Watching and Reading
interests.summary: I enjoy keeping up with the latest technology trends and learning new coding techniques. I often watch tech videos and read articles to stay informed.
